plot: Simón Galván's whereabouts, a country teacher who tries to support his school against unfair government measures. He is helped by a rich woman, Mrs. Lerena.
title: Maestro Ciruela
plot_es: Simón Galván's whereabouts, a country teacher who tries to support his school against unfair government measures. He is helped by a rich woman, Mrs. Lerena.
